name: limo
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a large, expensive car, often driven by a chauffeur (= a person employed to drive a car for someone else); short for
limousine : Despite his fame, he chooses to take the bus rather than get around in a chauffeur-driven limo. He got the limo driver to drive backwards up an alley to avoid people trying to follow.
More examplesFewer examplesShe jumped into a blacked-out limo.There was a limo waiting outside.Their date included a limo ride, a barbershop quartet, and seven dozen roses.
